title: when i change the folder from pytorch to other folders and import torch, i got an errorl ike this
body_html:
when i import torch under pytorch folder ,everyting is ok:
~/pytorch python

import torch

but when i change to other folder like ~/pytorch/tools

import torch
i got an error like this:

`AttributeError: type object "torch._C.FloatTensorBase" has no attribute "masked_copy_"`
>>>

anyone know why? thanks~
body_text:
when i import torch under pytorch folder ,everyting is ok:
~/pytorch python



import torch



but when i change to other folder like ~/pytorch/tools



import torch
i got an error like this:



`AttributeError: type object "torch._C.FloatTensorBase" has no attribute "masked_copy_"`
>>>

anyone know why? thanks~
body:
when i import torch under pytorch folder ,everyting is ok:
~/pytorch python
>>>import torch
>>>

but when i change to other folder like ~/pytorch/tools
>>>import torch
i got an error like this:
```
`AttributeError: type object "torch._C.FloatTensorBase" has no attribute "masked_copy_"`
>>>
```
anyone know why? thanks~
